userNotConfigured: Who are you? How'd you get in here? (User not configured)
accountDoesNotExist: No loitering. Open an account or leave, waster. (Couldn't find account)
tryAgainTypo: Try again. Careful this time, Fat Fingers. (Invalid argument)
alreadyRegistered: Yup, I've got your name right here. (User already exists)
registered: All investing is subject to risk, including the possible loss of the money you invest. (Registered successfully)
notEnoughCash: Dream a little smaller, you broke bastard. (Not enough cash)
notEnoughStock: Count up your shares and think again. (Not enough stock)
